name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe
display_help: You can wield a Battle Axe and master a variety of powerful Lethal attacks. Battle Axe is a slow but powerful weapon that has a tendency to send foes flying. This massive weapon has a bonus to hit.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Gash
powers.display_help: This is an attempt to remove your opponent's head from his neck with your Battle Axe. This attack is fairly quick for such a large weapon, and can knock down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 40.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
40.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Chop
powers.display_help: The Chop deals heavy damage with your Battle Axe, although it is much slower than Gash. This attack can knock down a target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Beheader
powers.display_help: Gashes your opponent with your Battle Axe dealing superior damage. This attack is very slow, but can deal a lot damage and knock the target down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Swoop
powers.display_help: A Swoop of your Battle Axe deals a superior amount of damage, and can send your target flying upwards. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 70.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knockup on target
70.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knockup on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Whirling_Axe
powers.display_help: You spin your Battle Axe in a huge arc, attacking all nearby foes. This attack deals moderate damage to any foe it hits, and can knock them down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Knockdown

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Cleave
powers.display_help: This is an attempt to split your opponent in two with one fell swoop of your Battle Axe. It is an extremely devastating attack that deals massive damage and can knock foes to the ground. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 10 ft. radius 20° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: 80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Battle_Axe.Pendulum
powers.display_help: This attack swings your Battle Axe in an arc directly in front of you. Foes struck by this attack are dealt heavy damage, and may be knocked down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 180° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
